MSNBC's Ari Melber invited Gordon Sondland on his show to do what they do best, which is talk crap about Trump. However, things took a turn for the worse when Sondland described “how badly the Biden-Harris team have prosecuted their job."

Anti-Trumper Gordon Sondland once said he never voted for Trump after Jan. 6. However, his mom never told him to ‘never say never’ and now he must eat his own words. Because only a lunatic
title: Watch: MSNBC dude loses his sh*t when a Trump impeachment witness says he's voting for him anyway

The International Longshoremen’s Association went on strike for the first time in decades. Today’s show breaks this down.

Thousands of members walked off the job, demanding protections from automation and a pay increase.

“It would be one thing if these have been people who have been underpaid, this is the backbone of America and the offers that have been made have been cutbacks and no concessions,” Crowder said.
title: Kamala's Abandons America:  Dockworker Strike Will Wreck Economy

Here she is bragging about the $750.

In a moment almost as bad as the original announcement of assistance for Maui burn victims, Kamala Harris comes out and says they

While the government is nowhere to be found, mules are saving the day and providing aid to hurricane victims in North Carolina. Thus, there is no better representation of how useless the bureaucracy is than this story.

Mountain Mule Packer Ranch in North Carolina is delivering supplies and aid to communities impacted by Hurricane Helene.

There is a team of mules in NC that's carrying supplies to people in the mountains who are stuck and unable to leave due to the flooding. God's sweet creatures are there for us in our time of need ❤
title: While government is nowhere to be found, MULES are bringing aid to hurricane victims

The Boomer Goodbye: Burn it to ash and salt the earth

I didn’t think I’d ever get to this point. I mean, “OK Boomer” has been around for years and I sort of let it slide by me. I was raised by Boomer parents. I had a good upbringing. Didn’t want for anything. Fulfilled the Millennial prophecy of going to college and getting a useless degree.

Somehow, the “ethics of work hard and you’ll get ahead” have driven me to where I am now: sitting at a computer at Louder with Crowder Studios.

But, a union leader has finally made me turn on the Boomer generation. Harold Daggett, head of the Internation
title: OK Boomer: Longshoreman union boss Harold Daggett is ready to destroy America and YOUR future
